title: Durham van traveller Esther Dingley missing in Pyrenees
description: Esther Dingley disappeared on a solo hike during a six-year journey through Europe in a campervan.

title: Klopp sarcastically congratulates BT over Milner injury & calls Wilder 'selfish'
description: Liverpool manager Jurgen Klopp sarcastically congratulates a TV journalist on James Milner's injury and calls Chris Wilder "selfish".

title: Mohsen Fakhrizadeh: What were the motives behind his killing?
description: Iran's top nuclear scientist Mohsen Fakhrizadeh was assassinated on Friday.

title: Mohsen Fakhrizadeh: Iran blames Israel for killing top scientist
description: Israel has not commented on the killing of Mohsen Fakhrizadeh in an ambush on his car on Friday.

title: ICYMI: Music for monkeys and penguins out in public
description: A quick look at just some stories you may have missed this week.

title: Travelling at Christmas: What you need to know
description: How will UK transport be affected by the five-day relaxation of Covid restrictions over Christmas?

title: BA 'sorry' for supporting England over Wales in rugby
description: The tweet is deleted and British Airways says it "unintentionally strayed offside".

title: WBBL Final: Sydney Thunder thrash Melbourne Stars by seven wickets to win title
description: Sydney Thunder crush a poor Melbourne Stars by seven wickets to win the Women's Big Bash League title.

title: Argentina 0-38 New Zealand: All Blacks avenge shock defeat to all but clinch Tri-Nations
description: New Zealand crush Argentina 38-0 to avenge their shock defeat two weeks ago and all but seal the Tri-Nations title.

title: Carrie Lam: Hong Kong's leader says she has to keep piles of cash at home
description: Carrie Lam says she has no bank account due to US sanctions, and pays cash for everything.

title: Arcadia: Buyers to 'pick over carcass' of Topshop owner, says former boss
description: Breaking up the Arcadia empire is "the only way" forward, former chief executive Lord Rose says.

title: Nicola Sturgeon 'never so certain' of Scotland independence
description: Nicola Sturgeon said support for independence is now the "majority view" as she opened the SNP's conference.

title: Covid: Free Vitamin D pills for 2.5 million vulnerable in England
description: There is no evidence that it protects against Covid-19 but it could boost the health of the vulnerable.

title: Covid: Hospitals could be overwhelmed without new tiers, says Gove
description: Michael Gove warns MPs strict rules are still needed in England despite lockdown ending on 2 December.

title: Damilola Taylor: A tribute to my friend
description: Damilola was 10 years old, when he was killed near his home in Peckham.

title: The Papers: Arcadia 'faces collapse', and plea to rebel MPs
description: Several of Saturday's papers report that Sir Philip Green's retail empire could enter administration.

title: The 'guerrilla girls' who changed the art world
description: How an anonymous group of female artists challenged the status quo in New York's art world

title: Surprise discovery of rare plant at Norfolk 'ghost pond'
description: A rare wetland plant has reappeared after not being seen for more than a century.

title: The Kraken: What is it and why has Trump's ex-lawyer released it?
description: How a lawsuit from an ex-Trump lawyer full of baseless voter fraud claims went viral.

title: Coronavirus lockdown sees share of women on India's stock market rise
description: With more time and flexibility, thousands of women are trading in the stock market for the first time.

title: Kaavan, the world's loneliest elephant, is finally going free
description: For decades, Kaavan performed from his lonely enclosure. Now, with a hand from Cher, he's retiring.

title: Nick Robinson: Let's give politicians a chance to speak human
description: Today presenter Nick Robinson on why the political interview is in need of a rethink.

title: Tigray crisis: Ethiopian soldiers accused of blocking border with Sudan
description: Families fleeing the conflict in Tigray tell the BBC they have been cut off from relatives.

title: Covid-19: 'People have got clean on Zoom - that's amazing'
description: Jade Hargreaves says video-calling during lockdown has helped people beat addiction.

title: 'My eyesight might be deteriorating - but my determination never will'
description: Elin Williams writes a blog to help other people with sight loss, but it has become her own "survival tool".

title: Coronation Street: Pandemic sees soap scrap 60th anniversary stunt
description: The soap has been forced to "go back to brass tacks" to mark its birthday, its producer says.

title: Maradona: Funeral worker apologises over coffin photos
description: The Argentine funeral worker took photos next to the open casket of football legend Diego Maradona.

title: Week in pictures: 21-27 November 2020
description: A selection of striking images taken around the world this week.

title: Climate change: The woman watching the ice melt from under her feet
description: For thousands of years Inupaiq people have relied on the land in Alaska but now climate change is threatening their entire way of life.

title: Jane Fonda: 'It's much harder to be young than it is old'
description: As an 82-year-old Jane Fonda is still protesting - this time about climate change - and getting arrested.

title: The Donut King who went full circle - from rags to riches, twice
description: Cambodian refugee Ted Ngoy made a fortune in doughnuts then lost it all to gambling.
